images.copyright: Boreal owl in a forest in Central Europe (© Ondrej Prosicky/Alamy)
images.title: Celebrating our teachers
images.caption: World Teachers' Day
images.desc: The tradition of teaching is deeply rooted in human history. Today, we honor those who dedicate their lives to sharing knowledge and shaping minds. Happy World Teachers' Day to all the educators who have helped us become who we are.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
